decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to apply pressure on the opponent using a combination of evasive creatures and disruptive spells. By deploying threats like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner, the deck aims to chip away at the opponent's life total while keeping their board in check with cards like Shoot the Sheriff and Essence Scatter. The inclusion of Enduring Curiosity and Tishana's Tidebinder provides card advantage and tempo advantage, allowing the player to maintain momentum throughout the game. The deck's game plan revolves around maintaining board presence and disrupting the opponent's strategy to secure a victory.

The main focus of this Jeskai Control deck is to disrupt and control your opponent's game plan while creating advantage through card draw and resource manipulation. It utilizes a mix of counterspells, removal, and proactive threats like Marang River Regent and Shiko, Paragon of the Way to slowly take over the game. The deck leans heavily on Jeskai Revelation and Stock Up for card advantage, while also using Authority of the Consuls to slow down aggressive opponents. With a mix of control elements and powerful threats, this deck aims to outlast and outvalue its opponents.

The focus of this deck is to quickly deploy aggressive creatures with the ability to disrupt your opponent's strategy. By utilizing a combination of creatures that can quickly attack and cards that can control your opponent's resources, you can overwhelm your opponent and secure victory. The inclusion of cards like Spyglass Siren, Floodpits Drowner, and Tishana's Tidebinder allow you to maintain pressure on your opponent while also controlling the flow of the game. Additionally, cards like Bitter Triumph and Shoot the Sheriff provide additional utility and removal options to maintain your advantage.

The primary focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast-paced, aggressive strategy using a combination of creatures and spells from the Dimir guild. By utilizing a mix of evasive creatures like Spyglass Siren and powerful removal spells like Shoot the Sheriff, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while dealing consistent damage. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Enduring Curiosity and Tishana's Tidebinder provide card draw and resilience to outlast the opponent in longer games. Overall, this deck thrives on tempo and pressure to secure victories.

The main focus of this deck is to assemble the key pieces needed to achieve an infinite combo loop that allows you to continuously cast powerful spells without paying their mana costs. By utilizing cards like Consult the Star Charts and Untethered Exhale to dig for key pieces like Omniscience and Roiling Dragonstorm, you can set up a game-winning sequence that overwhelms your opponent with a flurry of spells. Additionally, cards like Evendo, Waking Haven and Uthros, Titanic Godcore provide additional support and protection to ensure the combo goes off smoothly.

The main focus of this Aggro Red Deck Wins archetype is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The deck aims to deal damage as fast as possible, utilizing low-cost creatures like Callous Sell-Sword and Emberheart Challenger, along with burn spells like Full Bore and Dreadmaw's Ire. Leyline of Resonance helps increase the damage output, while Stadium Headliner provides a powerful threat that can end the game quickly. The deck also includes cards like Bulk Up and Turn Inside Out to buff up creatures and push for lethal damage.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with cards like Llanowar Elves and Willowrush Verge, allowing for early plays of powerful creatures like Gene Pollinator and Ouroboroid. Innkeeper's Talent and Spyglass Siren provide card draw and control options, while Tishana's Tidebinder and Floodpits Drowner disrupt the opponent's strategy. Jackal, Genius Geneticist and Keen-Eyed Curator offer additional card advantage and versatility. Multiversal Passage helps fix mana while Azure Beastbinder and Tyvar, the Pummeler offer extra aggression. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast, aggressive strategy backed up by card advantage and disruption.

The main focus of this UW Control deck is to establish board control by using various removals, counters, and defensive tools to slow down the opponent's game plan. The deck utilizes cards like Split Up, Perilous Snare, Authority of the Consuls, and Cryogen Relic to control the board while also generating card advantage through cards like Repurposing Bay and Simulacrum Synthesizer. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent and eventually win the game through attrition and card advantage, utilizing its powerful control tools to dictate the pace of the game.

The main concept of this UW Control deck is to slow down and disrupt the opponent's game plan while gaining incremental advantages through card advantage and resource manipulation. The deck focuses on controlling the board with cards like Perilous Snare and Authority of the Consuls, while also utilizing cards like Split Up and United Battlefront to gain advantage over time. With a mixture of removal, card draw, and defensive options, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and win through attrition.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively deal damage to the opponent as quickly as possible using a combination of fast creatures and burn spells. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent's defenses and win the game before they have a chance to stabilize. By playing efficient creatures and direct damage spells, the deck aims to close out games quickly and efficiently. The deck also includes some cards that provide extra value or protection to help maintain pressure on the opponent.

The main idea of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent by using aggressive creatures like Marauding Mako and Vivi Ornitier, while also controlling the board with removal spells like Torch the Tower and Winternight Stories. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of direct damage, creature aggression, and card advantage from cards like Profit's Eidetic Memory. The inclusion of Multiversal Passage and Riverpyre Verge allows for mana fixing and ramp, ensuring a consistent and powerful offense throughout the game.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent through a combination of fast, efficient spells and aggressive creatures. Cards like Burst Lightning, Burnout Bashtronaut, and Lightning Strike provide direct damage, while creatures like Hired Claw and Razorkin Needlehead can quickly chip away at the opponent's health. Soulstone Sanctuary and Riverpyre Verge offer some protection and card advantage, allowing the deck to maintain pressure on the opponent. The overall strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a barrage of attacks and burn spells.

The central theme of this Boros Control deck is centered around maintaining board control through a mix of removal spells, artifact creatures, and powerful enchantments. The goal is to establish a solid defense with cards like Pinnacle Starcage and Rest in Peace, while using cards like United Battlefront and Legion Extruder to pressure the opponent. The deck also has tools for card advantage with Dusk Rose Reliquary and Caretaker's Talent. Additionally, the mana base is optimized to ensure consistency in casting spells and maintaining control over the battlefield.

The main strategy of this deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells. By utilizing cards like Fear of Missing Out and Winternight Stories, you can deal significant damage to your opponent and control the board. Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Marauding Mako provide additional threats, while Vivi Ornitier and Profit's Eidetic Memory offer card advantage and powerful spells. With a mix of burn spells like Abrade and Torch the Tower, along with counterspells like Duelist of the Mind, you can disrupt your opponent's strategy while maintaining pressure on the board.

This deck focuses on controlling the board through various removal spells and counterspells while maintaining card advantage with draw spells and card selection. It aims to outvalue opponents by constantly disrupting their game plan and answering their threats efficiently. The win condition is either through overwhelming with powerful creatures like Marang River Regent or through incremental advantage with cards like Ultima and Elspeth, Storm Slayer. The mana base is designed to support the control aspect of the deck while ensuring consistency in casting spells across multiple colors.

The main idea of this deck is to control the game by disrupting your opponent's strategy with counterspells, removal spells, and hand disruption, while also generating card advantage through draw spells. Cards like Jeskai Revelation and Meticulous Archive help you to refill your hand and stay ahead in resources. Additionally, the deck aims to stabilize the board with Authority of the Consuls and gain life with Lightning Helix, while also having some finishers like Ultima and Marang River Regent to close out the game.
